Class RequestBuilder

    A builder for a REST Request.

    Tom Switzer

    • Method Detail

      • setPath

        public RequestBuilder setPath(Path path)
        Set the path to use. If the path is relative, it'll be appended to the current path. If it is absolute, then it will replace the path.
        Parameters:
        path - the request path
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • addHeader

        public RequestBuilder addHeader(String key,
                       String value)
        Add an HTTP header to the request.
        Parameters:
        key - the header
        value - the value of the header
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • addParam

        public RequestBuilder addParam(String key,
                      String value)
        Add a URL parameter to the request.
        Parameters:
        key - the parameter key
        value - the value of the parameter
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • addAllParams

        public RequestBuilder addAllParams(Map<String,String> params)
        Add many URL parameters to the request.
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters to add to the request
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • setContentType

        public RequestBuilder setContentType(ContentType contentType)
        Set the content type of the request to contentType.
        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type of the request body
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • setBody

        public RequestBuilder setBody(String body)
        Set the body as the UTF-8 encoding of the string body. This also sets the content length to be equal to the number of bytes in the UTF-8 encoding of body.
        Parameters:
        body - the body of the request
        Returns:
        this request builder
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if UTF-8 isn't support on the platform

      • setBody

        public RequestBuilder setBody(byte[] bytes)
        Set the body of the request to bytes.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the bytes to use as the request body
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • setBody

        public RequestBuilder setBody(File file)
        Set the body of the request to use the contents of file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to use as the body of the request
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • setBody

        public RequestBuilder setBody(InputStream body)
        Set the body of the request to use the contents of file.
        Parameters:
        body - the InputStream to use as the body of the request
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • setMethod

        public RequestBuilder setMethod(Method method)
        Set the HTTP method to use for the request.
        Parameters:
        method - the HTTP method used to make this request
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • addBasicAuth

        public RequestBuilder addBasicAuth(String user,
                          String password)
        Adds base authentication to a header map
        Parameters:
        user - user id
        password - user password

      • setHttpsRequired

        public RequestBuilder setHttpsRequired(boolean req)
        If set to true, then that means the request should not be executed unless the service is access via HTTPS (rather than HTTP). This may be desired when, eg, sending authentication information via basic auth.
        Parameters:
        req - true if this request requires HTTPS (default is false)
        Returns:
        this request builder

      • build

        public Request build()
